scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:backend"
scripts.scan: npm run start && npx react-scan@latest localhost:3000
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build --workspaces
scripts.migrate: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development knex migrate:latest --knexfile dist/knexfile.js
scripts.migrate:dev: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development knex migrate:latest --knexfile dist/knexfile.js
scripts.migrate:test: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test knex migrate:latest --knexfile dist/knexfile.js
scripts.migrate:prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production knex migrate:latest --knexfile dist/knexfile.js
scripts.seed: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development knex seed:run --knexfile dist/knexfile.js
scripts.seed:test: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test knex seed:run --knexfile dist/knexfile.js
scripts.seed:prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production knex seed:run --knexfile dist/knexfile.js
scripts.db:reset: npm run migrate:rollback && npm run migrate && npm run seed
